alert.note: Alert for Upper San Joaquin River; Yosemite NP outside of the valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 17 at 1:38PM PST until November 19 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM SATURDAY TO 4 AM PST SUNDAY ABOVE 8000 FEET... * WHAT...Areas of heavy snow expected above 8000 feet. Total snow accumulations of two to four inches from 8000 to 9000 feet. Total snow amounts of four to six inches from 9000 to 10000 feet. Total snow accumulations of six to twelve inches above 10000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Yosemite NP outside of the valley and Upper San Joaquin River Counties. * WHEN...Valid from 4 PM Saturday afternoon to 4 AM PST Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Upper San Joaquin River; Yosemite NP outside of the valley
